definitions.definition: Characterized by solemn religious ceremony or religious use , especially, in a positive sense; consecrated , made holy .
Religious ; relating to religion, or to the services of religion; not secular
Designated or exalted by a divine sanction ; possessing the highest title to obedience , honor , reverence , or veneration ; entitled to extreme reverence ; venerable .
Not to be profaned or violated ; inviolable .
Solemnly devoted, in a bad sense, as to evil, vengeance, curse, or the like; accursed; baleful.

main_definition: Characterized by solemn religious ceremony or religious use , especially, in a positive sense; consecrated , made holy .
secondary_definitions: Religious ; relating to religion, or to the services of religion; not secular
Designated or exalted by a divine sanction ; possessing the highest title to obedience , honor , reverence , or veneration ; entitled to extreme reverence ; venerable .
Not to be profaned or violated ; inviolable .
( followed by the preposition "to" ) Consecrated; dedicated ; devoted
( archaic ) Solemnly devoted, in a bad sense, as to evil, vengeance, curse, or the like; accursed; baleful.
